entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
